name: Tastyworks Tax Calculator
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y graphviz && git config --global --add safe.directory ${containerWorkspaceFolder} && chmod +x gradlew && ./gradlew --version && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && mkdir -p /home/developer/.local/bin && wget -q -O /home/developer/.local/bin/plantuml.jar https://github.com/plantuml/plantuml/releases/download/v1.2024.7/plantuml.jar && echo 'alias plantuml="java -jar /home/developer/.local/bin/plantuml.jar"' >> /home/developer/.bashrc
